txb_description.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"Name") and contains(@id,"DocuRef") and contains(@id,"DocuView") and  1]

txb_type.xpath: //input[contains(@aria-describedby,"helptext") and contains(@aria-describedby,"Type") and contains(@aria-describedby,"DocuRef") and contains(@aria-describedby,"DocuView") and  1]
